name: Remove Tacky Xmarks Globe Watermark Background
description:
Remove the tacky cheap looking earth globe background from the primary tree view within 'my bookmarks' 

This bad UI design makes it difficult to see text.
additional_info: Version 1.0 This is my first user style and I will be providing as close to zero support as possible. Just kidding! Seriously though, it so simple it shouldn't require too much support.
